Action.author: jjjjibm
Action.body: Hi Jim. If you agree with the attached part, and you're short on time, you can assign this back to me. Cheers.

Action.author: jjjjibm
Action.body: Date: Wed Mar 29 11:39:56 2017 -0400 node-SDK FAB-2853 test for 'undefined' fails I changed some tests like this: if ( === 'undefined) to if (typeof === 'undefined'). I also needed to add semi-colons to FabricCAClientImpl.js. See FAB-2853 for more discussion. Change-Id: I8471ba6e8b3ed151ce35ea07732c09ff9a295a49 Signed-off-by: jjjjibm >
